name: CryptoLottery NFT
description: The LOTTO tokens, created by CRYPTO LOTTERY NFT, are part of a DeFi-powered play-to-earn lottery DApp aimed at modernizing the traditional lottery model using blockchain technology. These tokens offer a reliable, tamper-proof platform while maintaining classic lottery elements. The LOTTO token, as the native currency of the Crypto Lottery NFT platform, is designed to transform the conventional lottery experience through blockchain and NFT technologies. With a total supply of 30 million, the token is used in mini-games and scratch-off drawings within the platform, creating a balanced and sustainable economy. The integration of blockchain and NFT technology ensures transparency, fairness, and security in all games and transactions, enabling public verification of platform activitiesâ€‹
